snippet: The process can be long and difficult for couples looking to end their marriages, several former church members say, as they are expected to find ways of working things out through the organization.
abstract: Divorce for Scientologists can be a long and difficult process, according to several former members of the church; couples like Katie Holmes and Tom Cruise, who are looking to end their marriage, are expected to find ways, through the Scientology organization, to uphold their commitments and work matters out.
lead_paragraph: The process can be long and difficult for couples looking to end their marriages, several former church members say, as they are expected to find ways of working things out through the organization.

headline.seo: For Scientologists, Divorce Is No Simple Matter
headline.main: For Scientologists, Divorce Is No Simple Matter
headline.print_headline: For Scientologists, Divorce Is No Simple Matter
